page.title: 10Niton-Life at the Lighthouse
page.content:
On most land based Stations there are three families;any children on stations of this sort are very fortunate as they have vast areas of grass to play on,free from traffic, and obviously no pollution problems. As for the working side,it is probably best described as a cross between caretaking and coastguarding.The beauty of the job is the fact that you only have to climb out of bed and you're at work!
Four men work on a shift system to cover 24 hours a day,365 days a year.
A constant watch is kept on the weather,in case of fog,also St.Catherine's is one of the many Lighthouses which report weather conditions every hour to the Meteorological Office.
